alert.note: Alert for Bent; Crowley; Kiowa; Otero; Prowers; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 8:24PM MDT until July 05 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Otero County in southeastern Colorado... Northwestern Prowers County in southeastern Colorado... Kiowa County in southeastern Colorado... Crowley County in southeastern Colorado... East central Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... Northern Bent County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 915 PM MDT. * At 824 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles west of Eads to near Boone, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eads, Fowler, Sweetwater Reservoir, Olney Springs, Neegronda Reservoir, Manzanola, Crowley, Neeoshe Reservoir and Queens Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bent; Crowley; Kiowa; Otero; Prowers; Pueblo
